par-0: In the development process, I use the ECMAScript 2015+ standard. I stick to the functional style when writing code.
par-1: I was trained as a front-end programmer on the Hexlet educational portal.
par-2: I help newbies learn the profession of a programmer by answering questions in the Hexlet community. Currently I'm reading the book by S. McConnell "Code Perfect". I take part in Open Source development.
